headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for shutters controlled by RFXtrx433(E) transceivers.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: option is here to support blinds that use the opposite direction.  normal / reverse

openSeconds.title: openSeconds
openSeconds.description: optional time for shutter to open, by default they are set to 25

closeSeconds.title: closeSeconds
closeSeconds.description: optional time for shutter to close, by default they are set to 22

excludedDeviceIds.title: excludedDeviceIds
excludedDeviceIds.description: option can be used to remove any shutter or shutter group to the platform.
